transcript:
Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello. Hello. Haan good morning sir.
Customer: Haan ji boliye.
Executive: Manish Marble se baat kar rahe hain na?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Ji ji sir. Meri baat Bhupen ji se ho rahi hai?

Executive: Hello. Kya bol rahe hain sir?
Executive: Meri baat Bhupen ji se ho rahi hai sir India Mart se baat kar raha tha main.
Customer: Bhupender ji se nahi ho rahi main Rakesh Sharma bol raha hun sir ji bol raha hun.
Executive: Achcha achcha. Ye bataiye ye jo services dekhte hain ye Mohit ji dekhte hain kya aapni?
Customer: Aaa Mohit ji number aap humko hatwana hai sir.
Executive: Kaun sa wala number?
Customer: Ye Mohit ji ka.
Executive: Mohit ji ka?
Customer: Aap bol rahe hain na ki ye number dusra ek to mera Bhupender ji ka ek mera number hai.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Ek teesra number aur kaun sa hai sir kyun pata nahi hai kaun kaun sa number add karwa raha account mein.
Executive: Nahi teesra number ek Mohit ji hain. Is three se last mein 332 hai unka number.
Executive: Ye bhi ye bhi wo services chalate hain kya aap?
Customer: Haan chalate hain sir wo wahi number band karwana hai sir wo apne kya hai ke milne wala hai usne wo hamare sala ne ye number add karwa diya wo to wahi karta hai isko deal.
Executive: Achcha to matlab services kaun dekhta hai aap logon ki ye aap services chalate hain wo kaun dekhta hai? Aap hi dekhte hain ya koi aur dekhta hai?
Customer: Nahi Bhupender ji dekhta hai.
Executive: Bhupen ji ka number kaun sa hai isme?
Customer: Bhupender ji ka number sir isme main abhi batata hun aapko.
Executive: Bhupen ji owner hai na company ke?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Owner company ke kaun hai Bhupen ji hain?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aap number bataiyega ek baar Bhupen ji ka.
Executive: Sir abhi batata hun main aapko number ek second wait kariye.

Executive: Sir 97063
Customer: 97063
Executive: 97063 aur 78087
Executive: 87
Customer: 87 87 78087
Executive: 87 na 97
Customer: 063 78087 ye Bhupen ji ka number hai.
Executive: Sir 88087 last mein.
Executive: Achcha last mein hai. Ek baar repeat kar de raha hun 97063 78087 theek hai?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Theek hai main baat kar lunga.
Customer: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to remove Mohit ji's number.

- Inquires about who manages the services.



Resolution:

- Executive verified Bhupen ji's number.

- Executive assured to resolve the issue.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- number removal, services, verification
